BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_INSTITUTE_MST (NUM_INST_ID, STR_INST_CODE, STR_INST_NAME, STR_INST_DESC, STR_CONTACT_PERSON, STR_ADDRESS, NUM_PHONE_NO, STR_EMAIL_ID, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PIST_INSTITUTE_SUBJ_MST (NUM_INST_ID, NUM_SUBJECT_ID, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_INSTITUTE_MST SET STR_INST_CODE=?,STR_INST_NAME=?,STR_INST_DESC=?,STR_CONTACT_PERSON=?,STR_ADDRESS=?,NUM_PHONE_NO=?,STR_EMAIL_ID=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_INST_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PIST_INSTITUTE_SUBJ_MST A WHERE A.NUM_INST_ID=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PIST_INSTITUTE_SUBJ_MST (NUM_INST_ID, NUM_SUBJECT_ID, GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_INSTITUTE_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1), T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_INST_ID=? and T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_INSTITUTE_SUBJ_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1), T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')), T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_INST_ID=? and T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
